Table of Contents

Class RectangularAngledFromCircleSourceInput

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Sources
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements ISourceInput. Defines input data for RectangularAngledFromCircleSource implementation including length, width, source profile, and initial tissue region index. The angle of the source is determined by the position on the tissue surface (dictated by the source profile) and the uniformly sampled circle position in air. All of the "AngledFrom" series of sources translate the source on tissue and the source in air separately.

public class RectangularAngledFromCircleSourceInput : ISourceInput
